duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clinical pharmacy services to patients within the assigned area and align with a medical service or group of patients based on a geographical area within the hospital and/or UF clinics.
Actively participate in relevant education and research activities.
Interact with supervisors, peers, support personnel, and students.
Integrate clinical services, education, and research activities.
Understand general hospital and ambulatory operations.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an ACPE-accredited school of pharmacy. PharmD or equivalent education and hospital training/experience required. PGY1 residency preferred. PGY2 residency highly preferred.
Registered pharmacist in Florida or eligible for the same.
Valid telephone number accessible to the Pharmacy Services Department of Shands Hospital.
